Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-27363 affecting package freetype for versions less than 2.13.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-27363 affecting package freetype for versions less than 2.13.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package freetype is earlier than 2.13.1-1, affected by CVE-2025-27363
